page.title: 05PONTYPOOL TERTIARY COLLEGE
page.content: Pontypool College Continued The College has a Rugby Team, a Football Team, and Netball and Hockey Teams. They let boys take Cookery and girls take Woodwork. There is not a Brassband or a Pop Group, but there are various instruments for students to practice on. The students are allowed to wear anything they like, within reason to College. An Annexe of the College is at the old Twmpath Secondary School, Twmpath Road, Pontypool. This is about one mile away from the main College building. At the{Annexe} Catering Courses are being held for Schools, Canteens, Restaurants and Hotels.
